Package com.ojcoleman.ahni.experiments

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RetinaProblemFitnessFunction
    Implements the Left and Right Retina Problem as described in Constraining Connectivity to Encourage Modularity in HyperNEAT (2011) In: Proceedings of the Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference (GECCO 2011).
    RLRecurrentNetworkBased  
    RLStateBased  
    TestTargetFitnessFunction
    A test fitness function that determines fitness based on how close the output of a network is to a target output given some input.
    TestTargetFitnessFunctionNEAT
    A test fitness function that determines fitness based on how close the output of a network is to a target output given some input.
    TMaze
    Implements the T-maze navigation task, for example see: Sebastian Risi and Kenneth O.
